document_data.name: Readers
document_data.mainbody:
The '''Readers''' were a religious organization in [[Zakhara]] whose members followed the teachings of [[Zann]], the Zakharan god of learning and intelligence.{{cite book/Land of Fate/Fortunes and Fates|29}}

The Readers did not have a favored weapon or symbol.
document_data.Activities: As ''anchorite'' [[Mystic (Zakhara)|mystics]], these fanatical devotees of Zann found [[Zakharan pantheon|Enlightenment]] through prodigious reading. The simple act of reading granted them their clerical powers; retention and comprehension of the subject matter was not required to gain access to their powers.
document_data.History: The Readers started several holy crusades over their 400-year existence.
document_data.Base of Operations: The Readers were based in [[Huzuz]], because the City of Delights had the best centers of learning in all of Zakhara. However, they could be found in any city that had a university or other renowned place of learning.
